markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Armored Exercise](/Feats.aspx?ID=2262) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [PFS Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=50) pg. 53</row>

**Archetype** [Swordmaster](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=33)

**Prerequisites**
[Swordmaster Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1139); trained in light, medium, or heavy armor

</column>

---

You've spent time training in your armor alongside other agents from the Swords. Your proficiency rank for light, medium, and heavy armor increases to expert for whichever of those you already had the trained proficiency rank in.
name: Armored Exercise
prerequisite: Swordmaster Dedication; trained in light, medium, or heavy armor
prerequisite_markdown: [Swordmaster Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1139); trained in light, medium, or heavy armor
